remarks: Lemma for ~ sylow3 , first part.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jan-2015.)
statement:
sylow3.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
sylow3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
sylow3.xf $e |- ( ph -> X e. Fin ) $.
sylow3.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prime ) $.
sylow3lem1.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
sylow3lem1.d $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
sylow3lem1.m $e |- .(+) = ( x e. X , y e. ( P pSyl G ) |-> ran ( z e. y |-> ( ( x .+ z ) .- x ) ) ) $.
sylow3lem1 $p |- ( ph -> .(+) e. ( G GrpAct ( P pSyl G ) ) ) $.
$d .(+) x y z $.
$d .+ x y z $.
$d .- x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d P x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y $.
$d x y z $.
